check_loop: ^I looked at Monsieur Fogg... and I could contain myself no longer.
^'What is the purpose of our journey, Monsieur?'

c-0: ^'That is what we will endeavour to find out,' he answered.
c-1: ^'Twenty thousand pounds,' he replied, quite flatly.

b: ^Ah, I see you have what I seek. Very well...
^You don't have what I need. Find it and return to me.

c-3: ^I asked nothing further of him then[.], and after a final, polite cough, he offered nothing more to me.
^'Ah[.'],' I replied, uncertain what I thought.

ending: ^Twice!? Beaten by an object... Twice! I've only known the taste of victory, but this taste...
^Is Is this my blood? Haha I've never known such... Such... relief..?
^I- I need some time to think... We will meet again, machine. May your woes be many... and your days few.
